title: Akihiro Mishima Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that Akihiro Mishima has joined the firm as a senior client partner. He will be based in the Tokyo office.
Mr. Mishima brings to the firm nearly ten years of experience consulting at a global executive search firm. He has provided hands-on support to client companies not only in search but also in executive assessment and other talent management-related consulting capacities. He has also managed several Japan key accounts on a global basis.
Prior to working in executive search, Mr. Mishima was the director of marketing, North Asia, at Herbalife in Japan. He began his career at Suntory Ltd., where he held various leadership roles in marketing, finance, corporate planning and M&A functions. He spent over 14 years in senior management overseas for Suntory’s major subsidiary companies in the U.S. and Southeast Asia, including serving as vice president, regional marketing at Cerebos Pacific Ltd. in Singapore.
“Mr. Mishima is a seasoned search consultant with in-depth experience in succession planning consulting and in developing and managing Japan-headquartered global companies,” said Teruo Seno, Managing Director of Korn Ferry’s Tokyo office. “We are truly delighted to have him join our team.”
Mr. Mishima holds an MBA from Northwestern University’s Kellogg Graduate School of Management, IL, U.S.A. He received a bachelor’s degree in Law from the University of Tokyo, Japan.
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization – the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
